name: Slutty Sluts Panic
description:
About this game:Slutty Sluts Panic is an action puzzle arcade game. Date hot chicks, avoid enemies, clear the areas and progress to get their nudes.
But remember: no pussy for pussies. Uncensored content will unlock only when you reach the minimum score or you beat the game!Date hot chicksEach of the 9 slutties available have 3 levels. Date all of them to get their nudes!Clearing the areasDraw lines in any of the four directions, (up, down, left, right), to clear the area. The biggest the chunk of area you draw, the biggest the bonus you get. Also make extra point for each of your remaining lives and remaining time.Get their nudes!Get a chick nude by clearing all of her levels, but remember: no pussy for pussies! Uncensored nudes will be unlocked only if you reach the required score or if you've already beaten the game.
You can check your sexy collection in your gallery.
